comments.body: Why can we delete this whole test suite?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,470 +0,0 @@
-// Copyright (c) 2020 Digital Asset (Switzerland) GmbH and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.

comments.body:
Why not like in all other places?
```suggestion
    Struct.assertFromSeq(List(n"fst" -> (()), n"snd" -> (())))
```

diffHunk:
@@ -44,7 +44,8 @@ class EqualitySpec extends WordSpec with Matchers with TableDrivenPropertyChecks
   private val VariantCon1: Ref.Name = "Left"
   private val VariantCon2: Ref.Name = "Right"
 
-  private val struct2Fields = ImmArray[Ref.Name]("fst", "snd")
+  private val struct2Fields =
+    Struct.assertFromSeq(List[Ref.Name]("fst", "snd") zip Stream.continually(()))

comments.body: We don't have test cases where the comparison of the keys fails here, do we? If not, we should add some.
